message: Let's start fair. Take 10%, I'll take the rest. It's a good deal for both of us.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be realistic - I'm proposing a 65/35 split in my favor.  Time is money, and we both lose value with each round.

Bob, I understand your point about fairness, but your last offer was still too one-sided.  Let's compromise.  I'll take 45% and you take 55%. This is a more reasonable split, and we can move forward.  We're both losing money with each round.
